moods.title: Be happy again
moods.message: Our sweetest songs are those that tell of saddest thought.

moods.title: Could be essential
moods.message: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.

moods.title: be curious
moods.message: The cure for boredom is curiosity

moods.title: Count to 10
moods.message: When angry count to ten before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred.

moods.title: Be happy now
moods.message: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life
